column5: So true Brian, thanks for sharing.
John, when I read this, I was thinking how this is so much like the members here.
The shooting or the helping Brian?
that was a good short story. thnx
As corny as this is , I bet there are not to many here that can read this without  getting all wiman like .. good story
That was great, Been having trouble getting into the season this year for a few reasons I'm not going to get into... That actually put somethings in perspective for me. Thanks for sharing that.

Yep...once again a man made me cry.  Reminds me of little miracle of my own.  When I was a single mom many years ago...25 in fact...I had taken in my younger brother who was in bad shape..anyhow, we were down to one pickle in a jar and one can of baby formula...it was January 1983, I had overspent on Christmas.  We laughed about the pickle but at the same time I was worried about feeding my baby.  It would be another week before the government check came... I was proud, too proud to ask for help...so I prayed instead. It was a day or two later that I received a letter in the mail.  It was from a guy I had met the summer prior and when I told him at that time that I was pregnant, I never heard from him again until that day.  He wrote me an apology letter and sent a check for $40.00 I was floored.  God does work in mysterious ways.
